Description: Do not translate ‘{x}’ with x being a number, or ‘\n’.
If a translation has a comma, the entire line MUST be wrapped in double quotes! Most editors (Excel, LibreCalc) will do this for you.
The 'Join Server' button in the main menu.

The title of the Server Browser tab

English: Game version mismatch! Server version: {0}, your version: {1}.
